ya3.2.1:709.1_1: Suddhāvāsānaṁ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanañca nuppajjissati rūpāyatanañca nuppajjittha.
ya3.2.1:710.1_0: Yassa yattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissatīti?
ya3.2.1:711.1_0: Arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati.
ya3.2.1:711.1_1: Suddhāvāsānaṁ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanañca nuppajjittha dhammāyatanañca nuppajjissati.
ya3.2.1:712.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjitthāti?
ya3.2.1:713.1_0: Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha.
ya3.2.1:713.1_1: Suddhāvāsānaṁ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanañca nuppajjissati rūpāyatanañca nuppajjittha. (Rūpāyatanamūlakaṁ.)
ya3.2.1:714.1_0: Yassa yattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha tassa tattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissatīti?
ya3.2.1:715.1_0: Asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati.
ya3.2.1:715.1_1: Suddhāvāsānaṁ tesaṁ tattha manāyatanañca nuppajjittha dhammāyatanañca nuppajjissati.
ya3.2.1:716.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati tassa tattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjitthāti?
ya3.2.1:717.1_0: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha dhammāyatanaṁ nuppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha manāyatanaṁ nuppajjittha.
